TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中以复选框形式显示的布尔型字段。

span.span: Represents a Boolean field that is displayed as a check box in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 复选框中显示的布尔数据字段的值。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display the value of a Boolean data field in a check box. 具体取决于使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件显示对象作为某一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. > [!NOTE] > 复选框被禁用 （只读），直到数据绑定控件显示一条记录包含在编辑模式下的复选框。A check box is disabled (read-only) until the data-bound control displays a record that contains the check box in edit mode. 有关如何将一条记录置于编辑模式的详细信息，请参阅包含的父控件的文档对象。For more information on how to put a record into edit mode, see the documentation for the parent control that contains the object. 若要指定要在中显示的字段对象，设置字段的名称的属性。To specify the field to display in a object, set the property with the field's name. > [!NOTE] > 复选框可以显示选定的或未选中的状态，因为对象可以绑定到具有布尔数据类型或可以通过分析的字符串的字段仅。Because a check box can display only a selected or an unselected state, a object can be bound only to a field with a Boolean data type or a string that can be parsed by . 可以通过设置显示每个复选框旁边的标题属性。You can display a caption next to each check box by setting the property. 一个对象被隐藏在数据绑定控制何时属性设置为`false`。A object is hidden in a data-bound control when the property is set to `false`. 若要防止字段的值在编辑模式中被修改，请设置属性设置为`true`。To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 在插入记录的支持数据绑定控件 (如控件)，您可以隐藏对象在插入模式下，通过设置属性设置为`false`。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), you can hide a object in insert mode by setting the property to `false`. 你可以自定义的标头和表尾部分对象。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示一个标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是显示文本的页眉节中，您可以通过设置中显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 标头部分可以隐藏在通过设置对象属性设置为`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可以显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支持这些数据绑定控件单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 你还可以自定义外观通过设置该字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||脚注部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象中控件来显示 Microsoft SQL Server 数据源中的字段与 Boolean 数据类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object in a control to display a field from a Microsoft SQL Server data source with a Boolean data type. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要动态添加对象传递给数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以向数据绑定控件动态添加字段，但强烈建议，所有字段以静态方式声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that all fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加对象传递给控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/CS/checkboxfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/VB/checkboxfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象中的值填充指定的 对象。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供方便地检索从指定的字段的值作为对象中对象。The method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in a object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 该方法没有返回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反，按通过引用返回的字段值传入对象`dictionary`参数。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 调用该方法后，循环访问对象来访问的字段值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 如果对象包含只读字段的值，则必须通过在`true`为`includeReadOnly`参数以包含这些值。If the object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.

summary.span: 检索在设计器中呈现 对象时用于字段值的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value used for the field's value when rendering the object in a designer.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是帮助器方法用于确定要在呈现时为字段显示的值在设计器中的对象。The method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the object in a designer. 如果实际数据不从数据源检索在设计时，此方法返回的值改为显示。If real data can not be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.

para.span: 扩展时类，您可以重写此方法以返回不同的值以显示设计器中的字段。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 编码的值可以帮助防止跨站点脚本攻击和恶意内容显示。HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.

summary.span: 将字段的值绑定到 对象中的复选框。

span.span: Binds the value of a field to a check box in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是帮助器方法用于将数据源中的字段的值绑定到相应的复选框在对象。The method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding check box in the object.

exception.span: 字段值绑定到的控件不是 控件。

span.span: The control to which the field value is bound is not a control.
\- or -

exception.span: 字段值不能转换为布尔值。

span.span: The field value cannot be converted to a Boolean value.

para.span: 扩展时类，您可以重写此方法以执行自定义绑定例程。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to perform a custom binding routine.

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在 对象中每一个复选框旁边的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption to display next to each check box in a object.

value.span: 显示在 中每一个复选框旁边的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed next to each check box in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于显示在每个复选框旁边的标题对象。The property is used to display a caption next to each check box in a object. 如果属性设置为空字符串，不显示任何标题。If the property is set to an empty string, no caption is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有复选框对象共享相同的标题。All check boxes in the object share the same caption. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义标题中的复选框对象中控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for the check boxes in a object in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用来确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 此方法已作为空方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调实现。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.

para.span: 派生的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法，不会引发异常;否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
